title: Embroidery Sample
description: applied black border, sides and edge--4\"--on off-white background; applied 1-1/2\" turquoise rayon, embroidered purple, white, cerise; above geometric floral band in shades of purple, green, orange; above is row of cross stitch figures and shapes in same colors; circle in star pattern in center and middle of either side--similar colors
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
